name: Dear Trauma
description:
Lost in an unknown universe, survive this hostile environment, uncovering your various facets and finding fragments of your history. As you walk towards a monument in ruins, explore this mysterious world in a 2D platform game with a silent storytelling.

Credits Created by

Bruna Lucchesi

The full game is under development, this is just a demonstration.
